titleInfo.title: USA v. Wu et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu re 104 Motion to Suppress. "With respect to Wu's statements made at the border on December 5, 2008, the motion to suppress is MOOT because the government does not seek to introduce them as evidence. The motion to suppress with respect to the search of Defendant Wu's laptop computer is DENIED." (Patch, Christine)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:08-cr-10386; USA v. Wu et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Massachusetts
extension.docketText: Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu re 104 Motion to Suppress. "With respect to Wu's statements made at the border on December 5, 2008, the motion to suppress is MOOT because the government does not seek to introduce them as evidence. The motion to suppress with respect to the search of Defendant Wu's laptop computer is DENIED." (Patch, Christine)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Wu et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu, Yufeng Wei, Bo Li, Chitron Electronics, Inc., Chitron Electronics Co. Limited. "The Court affirms the Magistrate Judge's order denying Defendants' Motion to Compel Production of Documents. However, the Court instructs the Government to comply with its obligations under Brady and Fed. R. Crim. P. 16(a)(1)(E) and turn over any exculpatory documents or documents material to the preparation of a defense." (Patch, Christine)Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu, Yufeng Wei, Bo Li, Chitron Electronics, Inc., Chitron Electronics Co. Limited. titleInfo.title: USA v. Wu et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu, Yufeng Wei, Chitron Electronics, Inc. "The Court DENIES defendants' Motion to Dismiss (Docket No. 161). The Court ALLOWS defendants' motions to set aside the verdict (Docket Nos. 208, 210) as to Counts 2 and 3 and DENIES the motion to set aside the verdict as to all other counts of which defendants were convicted. I DENY defendants' motion for a new trial. Finally, the Court DENIES defendant Wei's Motion for Acquittal on Count 34 of the Indictment." (Patch, Christine)Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu, Yufeng Wei, Chitron Electronics, Inc. "The Court DENIES defendants' Motion to Dismiss (Docket No. 161). The Court ALLOWS defendants' motions to set aside the verdict (Docket Nos. 208, 210) as to Counts 2 and 3 and DENIES the motion to set aside the verdict as to all other counts of which defendants were convicted. I DENY defendants' motion for a new trial. Finally, the Court DENIES defendant Wei's Motion for Acquittal on Count 34 of the Indictment." (Patch, Christine)Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Zhen Zhou Wu, Yufeng Wei, Chitron Electronics, Inc. "The Court DENIES defendants' Motion to Dismiss (Docket No. 161). The Court ALLOWS defendants' motions to set aside the verdict (Docket Nos. 208, 210) as to Counts 2 and 3 and DENIES the motion to set aside the verdict as to all other counts of which defendants were convicted. I DENY defendants' motion for a new trial. Finally, the Court DENIES defendant Wei's Motion for Acquittal on Count 34 of the Indictment." (Patch, Christine)
